div.p: You have trained to better harness your innate magical capabilities, gaining the following benefits:

Cute
Increase your Charisma score by 1 every other cat level, to a maximum of 20.

Fire Immunity
Your familiar is immune to fire damage.

Fiery Body
When a creature within 5 feet of your familiar hits it with a melee attack, the attacking creature takes 1d4 fire damage.
Also, the familiar gains the following additional actions:

Ignite
The familiar touches an object that isn’t being worn or carried, and ignites it.

Exploding kitten
The familiar leaps towards an enemy within 10ft and explodes dealing 2d4 + 1 in fire damage.

Lv 1: 0 kills (2d4 + 1 fire damage) (+1 Charisma) Lv 2: 3 kills (2d6 - 1 fire damage) Lv 3: 7 kills (2d6 + 1 fire damage) (+1 Charisma) Lv 4: 15 kills (4d4 fire damage) Lv 5: 25 kills (3d6 + 2 fire damage) (+1 Charisma)
